name: Deflour Your Diet Strategy
benefits: The deflour strategy emphasizes choosing whole, intact grains over flour-based products. Flour disrupts the cellular structure that helps trap calories and slow digestion. By avoiding flour and choosing intact grains, you maintain better blood sugar control and increased satiety.
amount: Avoid flour-based products; choose intact grains instead

quotes: With all the new data on the importance of food form, I'm starting to sour on flour, so I advise not living by bread alone.
DEFLOUR YOUR DIET - Replace flour products with intact grains.
